name: ForgetMeNot
0:
”Alexa, open Forget Me Not”
”Alexa, tell Forget Me Not, I am leaving for work”
”Alexa, tell Forget Me Not, I am going on date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forget me not
des:
Forget Me Not woks as last minute reminder for items to be carried along to your work place, sports practice or even on a date. Every one can the time we loose the key inside the house and lock ourselves out or forget to take along some important document when visiting bank. All those times all we needed was a nudge just before locking the door. Forget Me Not does exactly that, a gentle reminder to take along all your important things just before you leave the house, no matter where you are going. Full customization of the list of items is fully corresponding to individual needs is inherent to the skill. You can add or remove individual or block of things as per your requirement. 
The skill also adds up as travel plan companion by providing you with a list of important items to be taken along when planning a trip short or long. 
To know the items to be carried along just say i am leaving followed by name of place. The skill will respond with a default list of items people normally carry with them. The list once included in your places can be customized as per your need. Just say edit items after launching the skill and it will ask for addition or deletion of items. Say add or remove followed by item name to do the customization. Multiple items can also be added or removed to the list by saying the name of items separated by 'AND'.
Use Forget Me Not just before leaving home and you will never forget any important items you need.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
